content.question: Let <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> be the rational function defined by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator negative 3 open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses squared open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses over denominator open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses end fraction"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></mfrac></math>. Which of the following represents all intervals where <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses less than 0"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses 4 comma infinity close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></math> only

<math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 4 comma infinity close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses negative 2 comma negative 1 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses negative 1 comma 4 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses negative 2 comma negative 1 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 4 comma infinity close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 4 comma infinity close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
